'''Symphony''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Nostoi Region]] and [[Sea of Bygone Eras]], [[Fontaine]]. Press to activate a Pause Soundwave and cause specific objects in the area to stop moving. Hold to activate a Play Soundwave, which will cause specific objects in the area to start moving or reactivate entities affected by a Pause Soundwave.
